name: canna
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
a tropical American plant with a simple stem, large leaves, and often brightly coloured flowers: Most cannas are hybrid plants bred for their foliage. The nursery stocks 80 species of canna. Canna lilies provide beautiful foliage throughout the autumn.
More examplesFewer examplesCanna bulbs can be grown indoors in the early spring and then transplanted outdoors when the risk of frost has passed.
